verbose_text: However, the downregulation of Notch3 in 2 HCC cell lines has been shown to result in the downregulation of Hes1, the upregulation of CDKN1C / p57, and reduced cell growth through the induction of senescence instead of apoptosis.
evidence: Notch3 in 2 HCC cell lines has been shown to result in the downregulation of Hes1, the upregulation of CDKN1C/p57, and reduced cell growth
